entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
